title: Moves Like Jagger
lyrics:
[intro, whistle] (Bm7)  (Em7)
 
Just shoot for the (Bm7)stars, if it feels right
Then aim for my heart, if you feel like
Take me a(Em7)way, and make it okay
I swear I'll behave
 
You wanted con(Bm7)trol, so we waited
I put on a show, now I make it
You say I'm a (Em7)kid, my ego is big
I don't give a shit… and it goes like this
 
[chorus]
(Bm7) Take me by the tongue and I'll know you
Kiss me 'til you're drunk and I'll show you
All the (Em7)moves like Jagger
I've got the moves like Jagger
I've got the mooooves like Jagger
(Bm7) I don't need to try to control you
Look into my eyes and I'll own you
With them (Em7)moves like Jagger
I've got the moves like Jagger
I've got the mooooves like Jagger
 
Maybe it's (Bm7)hard, when you feel like
You're broken and scarred, nothing feels right
But when you're with (Em7)me
I'll make you believe, that I've got the key
 
So get in the (Bm7)car, we can ride it
Wherever you want, get inside it
And you wanna (Em7)steer, but I'm shifting gears
I'll take it from here… and it goes like this
 
[chorus]
(Bm7) Take me by the tongue and I'll know you
Kiss me 'til you're drunk and I'll show you
All the (Em7)moves like Jagger
I've got the moves like Jagger
I've got the mooooves like Jagger
(Bm7) I don't need to try to control you
Look into my eyes and I'll own you
With them (Em7)moves like Jagger
I've got the moves like Jagger
I've got the mooooves like Jagger
 
(Bm7) You wanna know, how to make me smile
Take control, own me just for the night
(Em7) And if I share my secret, you're gonna have to keep it
Nobody else can see this
(Bm7) So watch and learn, I won't show you twice
Head to toe, oh baby rub me right
(Em7) And if I share my secret, you're gonna have to keep it
Nobody else can see this… and it goes like this
 
[chorus]
(Bm7) Take me by the tongue and I'll know you
Kiss me 'til you're drunk and I'll show you
All the (Em7)moves like Jagger
I've got the moves like Jagger
I've got the mooooves like Jagger
(Bm7) I don't need to try to control you
Look into my eyes and I'll own you
With them (Em7)moves like Jagger
I've got the moves like Jagger
I've got the mooooves like Jagger
 
[outro, whistle] (Bm7) [end]
